input: Consider the following statements : Assertion (Q) : The reservation of thirty-three percent of seats for women in parliament and state legislature does not require constitutional Amendment. Reason (R) : Political parties contesting elections can allocate thirty-three per cent of seats they contest to women candidates without any Constitutional Amendment Which one of the following is correct?

options.A: Both Q and R are true and R is the correct explanation of Q.
options.B: Both Q and R are true but R is not the correct explanation of Q.
options.C: Q is true but R is false.
options.D: Q is false but R is true.
